description.@en: We come from dust and we return to dust.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you immediately blind one foe and they are unable to Counterspell, Dodge or Parry for the spell’s Duration.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the Duration.

criticalFailure.@en: The dust blows into the air, entirely ineffective. However, you are struck by a terrible Ætheric whiplash – a punishment! You are unable to Counterspell, Dodge or Parry for the spell’s Duration.

reagents.@en: A handful of grave dirt blown into the air (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can see
